panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together
panels.title: CPU Busy

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (5 min average)
panels.title: Sys Load (5m avg)

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (15 min average)
panels.title: Sys Load (15m avg)

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="user"}[1m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total[1m])))
sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{ mode="iowait"}[1m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total[1m])))
sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{ mode=~".*irq"}[1m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total[1m])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode!='idle',mode!='user',mode!='system',mode!='iowait',mode!='irq',mode!='softirq'}[1m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total[1m])))
sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{ mode="idle"}[1m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total[1m])))
